name: POLAPLAST P12-Spraycoat for running tracks
description: POLAPLAST P12-Spraycoat for running tracks is a low viscous, two component polyurethane spray coating with good long term elasticity. Meets IAAF standard, it ιs environment- friendly, flexible with high strength. POLAPLAST P12 is used as the second basic spray layer mixed with EPDM rubber granules, for the “on site” production of KDF's running track systems, POLTRACK SPRAYCOAT SYSTEM
